body:
Shit, I didn't know kitsune/Yokai had a habit of waiting around battlefields to eat the bodies of humans.  

I also was wondering where the Guro was until I read more of it, but afterward, think he was safer with the Nekotoma Maid and the Vampire Owner because this Fox girl wants to take pieces of the guy literally bite of flesh or an entire arm.
I mean she did take of a part of him and threaten to cut of his entire arm
I was baited... Where the guro at???
